<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ConcurrentHashTable - is a resizeable concurrent hashtable.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The number of resizings limited up to x2^31. This hashtable is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// useful to have efficient access to aggregate data(like strings,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// type descriptors...) and to keep only single copy of such</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// an aggregate. The hashtable allows only concurrent insertions:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// KeyDataTy&#42; = insert ( const KeyTy&amp; );</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Data structure:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Inserted value KeyTy is mapped to 64-bit hash value -&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">///          &#91;------- 64-bit Hash value --------&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">///          &#91;  StartEntryIndex &#93;&#91; Bucket Index &#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">///                    |                |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">///              points to the     points to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">///              first probe       the bucket.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">///              position inside</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">///              bucket entries</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// After initialization, all buckets have an initial size. During insertions,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// buckets might be extended to contain more entries. Each bucket can be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">/// independently resized and rehashed(no need to lock the whole table).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Different buckets may have different sizes. If the single bucket is full</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// then the bucket is resized.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BucketsArray keeps all buckets. Each bucket keeps an array of Entries</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (pointers to KeyDataTy) and another array of entries hashes:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BucketsArray&#91;BucketIdx&#93;.Hashes&#91;EntryIdx&#93;:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BucketsArray&#91;BucketIdx&#93;.Entries&#91;EntryIdx&#93;:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#91;Bucket 0&#93;.Hashes -&gt; &#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;&#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#91;Bucket 0&#93;.Entries -&gt; &#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;&#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#91;Bucket 1&#93;.Hashes -&gt; &#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;&#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;&#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;&#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#91;Bucket 1&#93;.Entries -&gt; &#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;&#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;&#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;&#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">///                      .........................</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#91;Bucket N&#93;.Hashes -&gt; &#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;&#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;&#91;uint32&#95;t&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#91;Bucket N&#93;.Entries -&gt; &#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;&#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;&#91;KeyDataTy&#42;&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ConcurrentHashTableByPtr uses an external thread-safe allocator to allocate</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">/// KeyDataTy items.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KeyTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KeyDataTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AllocatorTy&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate number of buckets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t EstimatedNumberOfBuckets = ThreadsNum;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ThreadsNum &gt; 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">      EstimatedNumberOfBuckets &#42;= InitialNumberOfBuckets;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">      EstimatedNumberOfBuckets &#42;= std::max(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">          1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">countr&#95;zero</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5542d44947f8d964b5ce3b20ea719b44">PowerOf2Ceil</a>(EstimatedSize / InitialNumberOfBuckets)) &gt;&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">              2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">    EstimatedNumberOfBuckets = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5542d44947f8d964b5ce3b20ea719b44">PowerOf2Ceil</a>(EstimatedNumberOfBuckets);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#aa62532a0a71ab55bbfc89fda24e23ed5">NumberOfBuckets</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">        std::min(EstimatedNumberOfBuckets, (uint64&#95;t)(1Ull &lt;&lt; 31));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Allocate buckets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Insert new value \\p NewValue or return already existing entry.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns entry and &quot;true&quot; if an entry is just inserted or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &quot;false&quot; if an entry already exists.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a05f04083a96d1718f46e8f875425e636"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;KeyDataTy &#42;, bool&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a05f04083a96d1718f46e8f875425e636">insert</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KeyTy &amp;NewValue) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate bucket index.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Hash = Info::getHashValue(NewValue);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket">Bucket</a> &amp;CurBucket = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a45da1a667c220a2ac0fedb7909854fdd">BucketsArray</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a857ab9b7da763acc25c658249b28392b">getBucketIdx</a>(Hash)&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t ExtHashBits = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#ae8cffee93b5b0c062e8d97e379bb1ef1">getExtHashBits</a>(Hash);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Lock bucket.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">    CurBucket.Guard.lock();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a76ae32da073683b2d4d166533619df7b">HashesPtr</a> BucketHashes = CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#a7b75e8b63cf9b1849f0310f3d82acb28">Hashes</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t CurEntryIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a168883c86f9ce8b870444e70b6764735">getStartIdx</a>(ExtHashBits, CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#aa615b1ffd20a1385b4fa159a306d2b5e">Size</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t CurEntryHashBits = BucketHashes&#91;CurEntryIdx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurEntryHashBits == 0 &amp;&amp; BucketEntries&#91;CurEntryIdx&#93; == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Found empty slot. Insert data.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">        KeyDataTy &#42;NewData = Info::create(NewValue, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#af35139c2a8f5bac9ccaa8fbdf71f575b">MultiThreadAllocator</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">        BucketEntries&#91;CurEntryIdx&#93; = NewData;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">        BucketHashes&#91;CurEntryIdx&#93; = ExtHashBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">        CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#ab2b0b6cb8e9ed68ff3a3ab5e5ed90548">NumberOfEntries</a>++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#ade6907f5a5422e625635b35e22dfe10a">RehashBucket</a>(CurBucket);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">        CurBucket.Guard.unlock();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;NewData, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurEntryHashBits == ExtHashBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Hash matched. Check value for equality.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">        KeyDataTy &#42;EntryData = BucketEntries&#91;CurEntryIdx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Info::isEqual(Info::getKey(&#42;EntryData), NewValue)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Already existed entry matched with inserted data is found.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">          CurBucket.Guard.unlock();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;EntryData, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurEntryIdx++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurEntryIdx &amp;= (CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#aa615b1ffd20a1385b4fa159a306d2b5e">Size</a> - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Insertion error.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Print information about current state of hash table structures.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#ac62bbcb37f3fbd47a66763f0125e9829"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#ac62bbcb37f3fbd47a66763f0125e9829">printStatistic</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">    OS &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n--- HashTable statistic:\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">    OS &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\nNumber of buckets = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#aa62532a0a71ab55bbfc89fda24e23ed5">NumberOfBuckets</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">    OS &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\nInitial bucket size = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#adefb4d96f9a87300048d14536cb53d57">InitialBucketSize</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t NumberOfNonEmptyBuckets = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t NumberOfEntriesPlusEmpty = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t OverallNumberOfEntries = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t OverallSize = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(&#42;this) + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#aa62532a0a71ab55bbfc89fda24e23ed5">NumberOfBuckets</a> &#42; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket">Bucket</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;uint32&#95;t, uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> BucketSizesMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each bucket...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint32&#95;t Idx = 0; Idx &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#aa62532a0a71ab55bbfc89fda24e23ed5">NumberOfBuckets</a>; Idx++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket">Bucket</a> &amp;CurBucket = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a45da1a667c220a2ac0fedb7909854fdd">BucketsArray</a>&#91;Idx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">    memset(DestHashes, 0, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#aa3e778be998a13fea1fddd7272d378c9">ExtHashBitsTy</a>) &#42; NewBucketSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a6aad12071c0bf07633da45ddffaacdb8">DataPtr</a> DestEntries = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a6894f2cdd05844b8809e7e2039210fb7">EntryDataTy</a>&#91;NewBucketSize&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">    memset(DestEntries, 0, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a6894f2cdd05844b8809e7e2039210fb7">EntryDataTy</a>) &#42; NewBucketSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each entry in source arrays...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint32&#95;t CurSrcEntryIdx = 0; CurSrcEntryIdx &lt; CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#aa615b1ffd20a1385b4fa159a306d2b5e">Size</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">         CurSrcEntryIdx++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t CurSrcEntryHashBits = SrcHashes&#91;CurSrcEntryIdx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check for null entry.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurSrcEntryHashBits == 0 &amp;&amp; SrcEntries&#91;CurSrcEntryIdx&#93; == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t StartDestIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/#a168883c86f9ce8b870444e70b6764735">getStartIdx</a>(CurSrcEntryHashBits, NewBucketSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert non-null entry into the new arrays.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint32&#95;t CurDestEntryHashBits = DestHashes&#91;StartDestIdx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurDestEntryHashBits == 0 &amp;&amp; DestEntries&#91;StartDestIdx&#93; == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Found empty slot. Insert data.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">          DestHashes&#91;StartDestIdx&#93; = CurSrcEntryHashBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">          DestEntries&#91;StartDestIdx&#93; = SrcEntries&#91;CurSrcEntryIdx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">        StartDestIdx++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">        StartDestIdx = StartDestIdx &amp; (NewBucketSize - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update bucket fields.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">    CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#a7b75e8b63cf9b1849f0310f3d82acb28">Hashes</a> = DestHashes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">    CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#a49298c812045349a99ae5d9c1f66f887">Entries</a> = DestEntries;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">    CurBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/concurrenthashtablebyptr/bucket/#aa615b1ffd20a1385b4fa159a306d2b5e">Size</a> = NewBucketSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Delete old bucket entries.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcHashes != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
